wardance.tooltip.parry: Parries up to %s times per %.2d seconds
wardance.tooltip.attack: Ambushes distracted targets for %s damage and unaware targets for %s damage
wardance.quickSkill: Cast Last Used Skill (Combat Mode only)
wardance:skills_general: Click on a skill in the sidebar to see its variations, then click on the variation you want and click on a gray slot to add it to that slot. Right click on a slot with a skill to clear that slot.
wardance:skills_colors: You can only equip one variation of one skill at a time, the currently equipped variation will be highlighted in red. Some skills cannot be simultaneously cast, and skills that cannot be cast at the same time as the skill you have selected will be highlighted in orange.
wardance:skills_terms:
Certain terminology are used consistently in these descriptions:
§oTaken§r damage is damage before armor, and §oreceived§r damage is damage after armor.
wardance:heavy_blow.base:
The next attack in 2 seconds launches a vicious strike, guaranteeing a critical hit. If the target parries the blow, their parrying hand will be disabled for 1.5 seconds. Recharges after 3 attacks, costs 1 might and 2 spirit.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the target has Iron Guard active.
wardance:heavy_blow.name: Heavy Blow
wardance:heavy_blow.desc: This attack's crit damage is increased by 40%.
wardance:backstab.name: Backstab
wardance:backstab.desc: Automatically cast heavy blow for free when attacking a distracted or unaware target, if it is not in cooldown.
wardance:poise.name: Poise
wardance:poise.desc: Duration increased by 1 second, parries are free until this skill expires or an attack is launched.
wardance:stagger.name: Stagger
wardance:stagger.desc: Adds up to 1.3 seconds of slowness and 5 posture damage depending on how slow your weapon is.
wardance:vault.name: Vault
wardance:vault.desc: +2 range for the attack and dash backwards slightly.
wardance:shatter.name: Shatter
wardance:shatter.desc: Bind time and crit damage multiplier scales with combo.
wardance:iron_guard.base:
Brace yourself for impact, causing the next melee parry in 1.5 seconds (no time restriction with manual parry) to reflect all posture damage back onto the attacker. Recharge after 5 parries, costs 2 spirit.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the melee attacker had Heavy Blow active.
wardance:iron_guard.name: Iron Guard
wardance:iron_guard.desc: If the attack was ranged, the projectile reflected back at its shooter with full force.
wardance:backpedal.name: Backpedal
wardance:backpedal.desc: Instead of reflecting posture damage, all posture damage taken is converted to knockback.
wardance:bind.name: Bind
wardance:bind.desc: The attacker's attacking hand will be bound for 2 seconds on parry.
wardance:mikiri.name: Mikiri
wardance:mikiri.desc: Iron guard automatically triggers, its cooldown is increased to 6 parries.
wardance:overpower.name: Overpower
wardance:overpower.desc: Additionally consume posture from the attacker as if attacking with the parrying weapon.
wardance:recovery.name: Recovery
wardance:recovery.desc: Your posture and spirit cooldowns are reset upon parry.
wardance:coup_de_grace.base: When toggled, all damage dealt to targets with less than 20% health (including wounding) will be converted to posture. An attack on a staggered target under 20% will instantly kill. Cast when active to end this skill. Recharge after 3 skill casts.
wardance:coup_de_grace.name: Coup de Grace
wardance:coup_de_grace.desc: The killing blow will grant 2 might.
wardance:rupture.name: Rupture
wardance:rupture.desc: Absorb half the target's spirit and allow the other half to violently escape in a large explosion. The size of the explosion is the square root of the target's max posture, and it deals up to (2*spirit) explosion damage to non-allies caught in the blast radius.
wardance:reinvigorate.name: Reinvigorate
wardance:reinvigorate.desc: Kills will additionally heal wounding, fatigue, and burnout by an amount equalt to 10% of your maximum in each resource.
wardance:reaping.name: Reaping
wardance:reaping.desc: Activate to gain omnidirectional sweep. This attack cannot be parried, targets below ((5% of max health)+(weapon damage)*2) will take true damage, and this skill instantly refreshes if a target dies in this manner. Cooldown +3.
wardance:frenzy.name: Frenzy
wardance:frenzy.desc: All physical skills instantly cool down on a kill.
wardance:danse_macabre.name: Danse Macabre
wardance:danse_macabre.desc: The percentage at which an entity is eligible for execution scales with your combo, up to 40%.
wardance:kick.base: The next attack in 2 seconds only has a range of 3 blocks, but deals 4 unblockable posture damage. Recharge after 4 attacks, costs 4 spirit.
wardance:kick.name: Kick
wardance:kick.desc: Additionally deals 3 points of falling block damage.
wardance:trip.name: Trip
wardance:trip.desc: Usable only when both you and your target are grounded. Reduce target posture regeneration by 60% for an amount of time equal to double its posture cooldown. Cooldown -1.
wardance:trip.requirement: requires 4 spirit and must be standing
wardance:tackle.name: Tackle
wardance:tackle.desc: +2 range on kick and dash forward.
wardance:low_sweep.name: Low Sweep
wardance:low_sweep.desc: Kicks sweep a 90 degree area in front of you.
wardance:iron_knee.name: Iron Knee
wardance:iron_knee.desc: All knockback from the attack is converted into additional posture damage.
wardance:backflip.name: Backflip
wardance:backflip.desc: Use the reaction force to leap back and recover 30% lost posture, adds 0.4 combo.
wardance:grapple.base: Landing two unarmed strikes on the same target in 3 seconds after casting this skill will grab and throw them to the ground for 8 true posture damage. Recharge after 7 attacks, costs 3 spirit.
wardance:grapple.name: Grapple
wardance:suplex.name: Suplex
wardance:suplex.desc: Grab the target and brutally slam them behind you, dealing double of your current posture as true posture damage to the target, but also consuming almost all of your own posture.
wardance:submission.name: Submission
wardance:submission.desc: Grapple triggers on first strike and has its cooldown reduced by 2 if you have more armor than your target.
wardance:reversal.name: Reversal
wardance:reversal.desc: A successful grapple instead swaps the posture of the attacker and target by percentage.
wardance:clinch.name: Clinch
wardance:clinch.desc: The hand performing the first unarmed strike will bind the same hand on the target. If both hands are empty, both of the target's hands will be simultaneously bound.
wardance:shield_bash.base: In the next 2 seconds, your shield will behave as a range 3 blunt weapon once, dealing additional posture damage equivalent to its shield time. Recharge in 4 parries, costs 3 spirit.
wardance:shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
wardance:shield_bash.desc: Upon cast, ready your equipped shields if they are currently bound.
wardance:rim_punch.name: Rim Punch
wardance:rim_punch.desc: Smash the shield's rim into the target, nauseating them for 2 seconds and inflicting additional knockback.
wardance:overbear.name: Overbear
wardance:overbear.desc: Put all your weight into the attack, dealing extra damage equal to double your shield time and doubling posture damage. If this does not stagger the target, slows you for 2.5 seconds.
wardance:foot_slam.name: Foot Slam
wardance:foot_slam.desc: Slam the shield into the enemy's foot, slowing and distracting them for 3 seconds.
wardance:berserk.name: Berserk
wardance:berserk.desc: Upon cast and successful attack with shield, recharge unbound hands and increase your attack speed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
wardance:arm_lock.name: Arm Lock
wardance:arm_lock.desc: When active, parrying will bind the attacker's attacking hands for 1.5 seconds.
wardance:war_cry.base: The passive will function until the skill enters cooldown. If cast at full posture, no might, and full spirit, this skill will simulate a full night's sleep after five seconds of not taking damage, during which time you are immobile; otherwise, you gain a series of buffs. Recharge after 5 minutes or sleeping in a bed.
wardance:war_cry.name: Meditate/War Cry
wardance:war_cry.sleep.name: Meditate
wardance:war_cry.nosleep.name: War Cry
wardance:war_cry.desc:
§lPassive:§r +50% healing. 
§l Active:§r gain the buffs of a golden apple.
wardance:wind_scar.name: Wind Scar
wardance:wind_scar.desc:
§lPassive:§r +1 block reach. 
§l Active:§r gain omnidirectional sweeping for 10 seconds.
wardance:timberfall.name: Timberfall
wardance:timberfall.desc:
§lPassive:§r 5x the might generated is added to posture damage on attack. 
§l Active:§r guarantee crit and +40% dealt melee damage for 10 seconds.
wardance:frost_fang.name: Frost Fang
wardance:frost_fang.desc:
§lPassive:§r +2 luck. 
§l Active:§r for 20 seconds, gain 40% speed and slow enemies for 3 seconds on hit; if they are alert, they are additionally blinded for 1 second.
wardance:flame_dance.name: Flame Dance
wardance:flame_dance.desc:
§lPassive:§r attack speed increases by 0.1 for every level of combo. 
§l Active:§r for 20 seconds, every third hit will crit for an additional 1.5x damage and cause your next parry to be free.
wardance:boulder_brace.name: Boulder Brace
wardance:boulder_brace.desc:
§lPassive:§r halved posture cooldown time. 
§l Active:§r restore all posture; for 10 seconds, regenerate 1 posture per second regardless of cooldown.
wardance:feint.base: The next attack in 2.5 seconds tricks an alert opponent into guarding against it. If it is parried, both hands of the target will be reset; if it is not parried, all damage dealt is converted into posture damage. This hit cannot stagger the target. A target of feint cannot be feinted again until they cease being alert. Recharge in 3 attacks, costs 5 spirit.
wardance:feint.name: Feint
wardance:feint.desc: After the feint, your attacking hand instantly recharges.
wardance:upper_hand.name: Upper Hand
wardance:upper_hand.desc: Recover an equivalent amount of posture.
wardance:smirking_shadow.name: Smirking Shadow
wardance:smirking_shadow.desc: Teleport 2 blocks behind the target after the attack.
wardance:scorpion_sting.name: Scorpion Sting
wardance:scorpion_sting.desc: This attack will trigger effects that apply on damage if it is not parried.
wardance:last_surprise.name: Last Surprise
wardance:last_surprise.desc: The target is distracted for 3 seconds.
wardance:capricious_strike.name: Capricious Strike
wardance:capricious_strike.desc: The target can continuously be feinted; skill cooldown lengthened to 6 attacks.
wardance:crown_champion.base: The strong grow stronger, and the weak grow weaker.
wardance:crown_champion.name: Crown Champion
wardance:crown_champion.desc: Gain 5% extra attack damage per level of might.
wardance:vengeful_might.name: Vengeful Might
wardance:vengeful_might.desc: Gain 50% of damage received as might, your attacker will be highlighted for 5 seconds.
wardance:prideful_might.name: Prideful Might
wardance:prideful_might.desc: Might gain is tripled, but all might is lost when receiving damage. After gaining 3 levels of might, your shatter will instantly cool down.
wardance:hidden_might.name: Hidden Might
wardance:hidden_might.desc: Gain 0.5 might from an unaware attack. The distance at which you are detected is reduced by 30%; for every level of might you gain, 3% of this detection is converted to speed.
wardance:elemental_might.name: Elemental Might
wardance:elemental_might.desc: Attacking a target causes it to take 1 more damage from non-physical sources for the next 5 seconds; gain 1 might when an entity in 5 blocks dies from non-physical damage.
wardance:execution.base:
Costs 8 might to activate. Disables might gain, converts all dealt melee damage to posture, and takes one life's worth of health from a staggered target, ending their stagger instantly.
Monsters have an amount of lives equal to the natural logarithm of their max health minus one, and players always have three.
wardance:execution.name: Execution
wardance:onslaught.name: Onslaught
wardance:onslaught.desc: While active, all generated might is instead used to cast your equipped variation of heavy blow (defaulting to the base variation if it is not equipped) automatically, without cooldown or spirit cost.
wardance:masters_lesson.name: Master's Lesson
wardance:masters_lesson.desc: While active, all generated might will be converted into free parries at a 1:2 ratio instead.
wardance:flare.name: Flare
wardance:flare.desc: Take two lives, then cause the target to rapidly regenerate 1.4 lives.
wardance:lichtenberg_scar.name: Lichtenberg Scar
wardance:lichtenberg_scar.desc: Drains spirit by 1/second when active to additionally record damage as charge, expiring early if spirit is fully expended. Spirit is fully drained on execution to multiply charge by (remaining spirit+1); charge is then distributed across every enemy in a 10-block radius as lightning damage, summoning a lightning bolt above each target.
wardance:crowd_pleaser.name: Crowd Pleaser
wardance:crowd_pleaser.desc: After taking a life, allies within 10 blocks gain buffs for half the duration of the life's worth in health. For every two skills cast during execution, every existing buff increases in potency, and an additional buff is applied. Speed and strength are applied first, then luck, regeneration, and finally resistance (capped at resistance III).
wardance:memento_mori.name: Memento Mori
wardance:memento_mori.desc: For every 1% health lost (including wounding), you gain 1% extra might and 0.5% extra damage.
wardance:rapid_clotting.name: Rapid Clotting
wardance:panic.name: Panic
wardance:panic.desc: When taking damage, create a smoke cloud that blinds all enemies in 10 blocks whose distance to you exceeds (current health percentage*10) blocks.
wardance:death_denial.name: Death Denial
wardance:death_denial.desc: Upon taking fatal damage, become immune to all damage and healing for 5 seconds. Recharges after sleeping.
wardance:saving_throw.name: Saving Throw
wardance:saving_throw.desc: Additionally gain 0.1 luck per 1% lost health.
wardance:pound_of_flesh.name: Pound of Flesh
wardance:pound_of_flesh.desc: Active skill, consumes all your spirit. When attacking, consume 5% max health to deal 5% of the target's max health, or 10% of the target's max posture if the attack was parried. Lasts until (2*spirit) seconds have elapsed or your spirit fully regenerates.
wardance:descend.base: Can only be cast when standing on the ground. Until you touch the ground again, your next attack will additionally deal (fall distance*2) posture damage; performing said attack will negate fall damage. Costs 5 spirit and recharges after 6 attacks, with distracted attacks counting as 2 and unaware attacks counting as 4 attacks.
wardance:descend.name: Descend
wardance:descend.desc: Additionally deals (fall distance) falling block damage.
wardance:descend.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance:hawk_dive.name: Phantom Dive
wardance:hawk_dive.desc: Can be cast while airborne. If you are flying with an elytra, you will automatically stop flying. Every 7 blocks fallen upgrades the attack's ambush tier (alert->distracted->unaware); every upgrade beyond unaware paralyzes the target for for 3 seconds.
wardance:lights_out.name: Lights Out
wardance:lights_out.desc: If the target is staggered by this attack, it will be blinded and stagger time will be lengthened to 10 seconds, but stagger count will be set to 1.
wardance:lights_out.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance:shockwave.name: Shockwave
wardance:shockwave.desc: No effects on attack. Landing will create a shockwave that deals (fall distance/2) posture damage to all entities within 4 blocks, negating fall damage.
wardance:shockwave.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance:titans_fall.name: Titanfall
wardance:titans_fall.desc: Consumes all of your own posture and deal it as additional damage to the target, increased by 4% per armor point you have.
wardance:titans_fall.requirement: requires 5 spirit and must be grounded
wardance:hex.base: In the next 3 seconds, your next attack will deal no damage but inflict an incurable debuff if it is not parried. Costs 5 spirit and cools down in 15 seconds.
wardance:hex.name: Hex
wardance:hex.desc: The target's luck is reduced by 2 for 10 seconds.
wardance:itchy_curse.name: Itchy Curse
wardance:itchy_curse.desc: Inflicts a form of paresthesia on the target. Paresthesia lasts 3 seconds, but only ticks down if the target is not moving. The target is treated as distracted, and will be immobilized with both its hands bound every 3 seconds.
wardance:snakebite.name: Snakebite
wardance:snakebite.desc: Inflicts a minimum of poison II for 10 seconds on the target, taking the higher value for both duration and potency if the target already has poison active, and renders it incurable by milk. The target cannot heal as long as the poison effect remains active.
wardance:unravel.name: Unravel
wardance:unravel.desc: This effect cannot be parried. Violently removes one level from every potion effect curable by milk on the target, creating an explosion. The size of the explosion scales with the duration of all effects on the target, up to a 10 block radius; the damage at the center of the explosion increases by 4*(former effect level) per effect that had its potency reduced, and 2 per effect that did not.
wardance:black_mark.name: Black Mark
wardance:black_mark.desc: Saps the target of its vitality. For 10 seconds, any creature that deals damage to the target will heal for 1/3 the dealt damage and drain either 2 posture or 3 spirit, whichever the attacker has less of, recovering half that amount.
wardance:petrify.name: Stiffen
wardance:petrify.desc: Additionally converts absorption, deflection, and 30% armor into an equivalent amount of shatter.
wardance:morale.base: Regain spirit when performing certain combat actions.
wardance:morale.name: Morale
wardance:morale.desc: Regain (1/attack speed) spirit when parrying or landing a critical hit.
wardance:archers_paradox.name: Archer's Paradox
wardance:archers_paradox.desc: Regain 1 spirit when your projectile hits a target or when you attack a non-alert target. This ability has a 1.5 second cooldown between triggers.
wardance:apathy.name: Apathy
wardance:apathy.desc: You have 4 base spirit, your spirit instantly regenerates after cooldown, you are immune to burnout. Burnout accumulated will be applied if you remove this passive.
wardance:natural_sprinter.name: Natural Sprinter
wardance:natural_sprinter.desc: You are very dangerous at short distances. Your max spirit is doubled, but its regeneration speed is reduced to a third; you recover 3 spirit on a kill.
wardance:speed_demon.name: Speed Demon
wardance:speed_demon.desc: Halve spirit cooldown on a dodge and regain spirit on attack based on speed. The faster you are compared to your target, the more spirit is regenerated.
wardance:lady_luck.name: Lady Luck
wardance:lady_luck.desc: When casting a skill there is a (1+luck)/(5+luck) chance (to a minimum of 20%) to instantly refund the spirit cost of the skill. This chance stacks if it fails to trigger.
